FMM.pipeline module

class FMM.pipeline.PipelineEnd2End(comm)[source]

Bases: object

Wrapper for End-2-End pipeline. It added class one after the others by running method.run().

Methods

main
main(specific_file=None)[source]
class FMM.pipeline.PipelineFrequencyMapMaking(comm, file, params)[source]

Bases: object

Instance to reconstruct frequency maps using QUBIC abilities.

Methods

get_dict([key])

Method to modify the qubic dictionary.

get_input_map()

Function to get the input maps from PySM3

get_ultrawideband_config()

Method that pre-compute UWB configuration.

print_message(message)

Method to print message only on rank 0 if MPI communicator is detected.

run()

Method to run the whole pipeline from TOD generation from sky reconstruction by reading params.yml file.

save_data(name, d)

Method to save data using pickle convention.

Method to modify the qubic dictionary.

get_input_map()[source]

Function to get the input maps from PySM3

Returns:

Input maps with shape [Nrec, 12*nside, Nstk]

Return type:

array

get_ultrawideband_config()[source]

Method that pre-compute UWB configuration.

print_message(message)[source]

Method to print message only on rank 0 if MPI communicator is detected. It display simple message if not.

run()[source]

Method to run the whole pipeline from TOD generation from sky reconstruction by reading params.yml file.

Method to save data using pickle convention.
